name: chmara
description:
More like a proof of concept than actual game, because it has no depth or any specific game play loop. The main concept is to avoid spreading corruption by creating and mixing specific automatons that help you to wall from and destroy  the plague.
Warning: Be aware, that there might be flickering lights, which may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

Controls:

W, A, S ,D - movement

1 - build living cell generator

2 - plant vine, plant them in pattern to make them grow

R - restart

The game has no win condition, you can only lose or destroy the plague.
